with so many advancements and changes going on in the tech world lately Gmail users may be excited to hear that Google is rolling out a revamped interface PERIOD

For now the new features are optin but Gmail will eventually automatically upgrade all accounts to the new look PERIOD

If you dont want to wait for the new look you can switch to it today by clicking on Switch to the new look in the bottom right of Gmail PERIOD

A Gmail user myself I decided to be adventurous today and switch to the new look PERIOD I love it PERIOD The redesign is simply a new layout to learn no new features PERIOD

In the past I avoided checking my Gmail account at all costs because of the cluttered and overwhelming layout PERIOD

The new strippeddown interface is cleaner and more modern  I might actually want to use my Gmail now PERIOD

Fox News lists eight major changes that users will notice in the new Gmail PERIOD

 PERIOD Gmail automatically resizes itself to fit into any sized window PERIOD

 PERIOD You can control the amount of emails shown on your screen at a time by adjusting the display density PERIOD Choose from Comfortable Cozy and Compact. i prefer Cozy. pERIOD Adjust the size of the label and chat panes to suit your needs PERIOD

 PERIOD The labels themselves have more prominence in the new layout and make followup more efficient PERIOD

 PERIOD New themes that include a wider selection of highresolution background pictures PERIOD

 PERIOD Conversation threads have been reorganized for improved readability possibly the most useful redesign element in the new Gmail. pERIOD Each email in a thread also displays the senders profile picture PERIOD

 PERIOD Theres a new allinone search function PERIOD

Regret making the change early Users can temporarily postpone the switch to the new look in the new settings menu but sooner or later Google will flip the switch for everyone PERIOD
